Items.Title: Overview
Items.Description: The goal of the repo is for you to have a working Azure Arc demo environment spun up in no-time so you can focus on playing, demoing, upskilling yourself and your team and see the core value of Azure Arc. Explore our different Jumpstart products.

Items.Title: Jumpstart Scenarios
Items.Description: Accelerate your deployment with our jumpstart solutions.

Items.Title: Jumpstart Agora
Items.Description: Collection of industry verticals from cloud to edge scenarios.

Items.Title: Jumpstart ArcBox
Items.Description: Explore Azure Arc capabilities with Azure Sandbox.

Items.Title: Jumpstart HCIBox
Items.Description: Explore Azure Stack HCI capabilities with Azure Sandbox.

Items.Title: Jumpstart Lightning
Items.Description: Watch our show where people share their stories.

Items.Title: Jumpstart Scenarios
Items.Description: All these solution types leverage Azure Arc, a management service that extends Azure services and management capabilities to any infrastructure, enabling you to effectively manage and govern resources across on-premises, multi-cloud, and edge environments through Azure portal.

Items.Title: Servers
Items.Description: Onboard various Windows and Linux server distributions.

Items.Title: VMware vSphere
Items.Description: Manage VMware vSphere resources.

Items.Title: Kubernetes
Items.Description: Onboard various Kubernetes distributions.

Items.Title: Data services
Items.Description: Deploy data services on multiple infrastructure platforms.

Items.Title: App services
Items.Description: Deploy app services on multiple infrastructure platforms.

Items.Title: ML
Items.Description: Deploy machine learning on Kubernetes.

Items.Title: Management
Items.Description: Unify Multi-Cloud Management in Hybrid Environments.

Items.Title: Additional resources
Items.Description: Your all-inclusive resource destination: everything you need in one place.

Items.Title: ArcBox
Items.Description: Jumpstart ArcBox is a sandbox environment that allows users to explore all the major capabilities of Azure Arc with a click of a button.

Items.Description: Azure services curated for IT Pros including Azure Sentinel.

Items.Description: Azure services curated for DevOps including GitHub, OSM, Key Vault.

Items.Title: ArcBox for DataOps
Items.Description: Azure services curated for DevOps including Tags and Grafana.
